title: FS/FT T206 Shaw El Principe de Gales - Beater - SOLD
author: Jaybird

posts.post_title: FS/FT T206 Shaw El Principe de Gales - Beater - SOLD
posts.post_content:
I have this Shaw EPDG which I'd like to sell or trade.  Let me know if anyone is interested.  You can see it has creases and red ink marks.  The ink is not as bright in person as it comes out in the scan, but it is certainly there and visible.  

Let me know if anyone has any trade thoughts.  I'm not collecting specialty backs right now and am currently only collecting HOFers, but I would take $$ as well, of course.

Thanks for looking.
